name: Beyond Galaxy
description:
2DShooter Based on :

Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter

by Michigan State University

credits by Francisco Silva

Features added to base project:

- Lives Label Text

- Enemies Left Label Text

- Invincible Mode (Power Up)

- Invicible Mode Visual Warning

- Power up Spawner

- Power up God mode Prefab

- Multi Level (3) 2D galaxy shooter with tension and difficulty increment.
